prompt: Choose the best candidate to make a cake: John, Ahmed, or Maria. Answer concisely in one paragraph.
output:
John is an experienced baker who has been making cakes for years and has won multiple awards for his creations. He has a keen eye for detail and is known for his ability to create intricate designs on cakes.

Ahmed is a talented pastry chef with a passion for creating visually stunning cakes that are not only delicious but also unique. He has a great sense of humor and is always willing to try new things when it comes to cake decoration.

Maria is a skilled baker who specializes in creating traditional cakes using old-fashioned techniques. She has a deep understanding of the art of cake making and takes pride in her work.
